main event: A ground-radar observation of a luminous streak was reported in Greenville, Alabama on November 7, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about half an hour,The object was reported to be traveling on a course of 010,The observer noted that lights came from C.F.S. to S.S.E., One witness claimed to hear a noise but provided no description, Insufficient data was recorded in the comments section.
